mapper.select: SELECT a.MEM_SEQ , a.cnt AS CNT , mm.USER_NM FROM (SELECT sam2.MEM_SEQ, count(*) cnt FROM SMI_ATN_MNG sam LEFT OUTER JOIN SMI_ATN_MNG sam2 ON sam.SCH_SEQ = sam2.SCH_SEQ WHERE sam.MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} AND sam.MEM_SEQ != sam2.MEM_SEQ GROUP BY MEM_SEQ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN MEM_MNG mm ON a.MEM_SEQ = mm.MEM_SEQ WHERE mm.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY cnt desc LIMIT 10
SELECT concat(SCH_DATE, SCH_TIME) SCH_DATE , SCH_NM , SCH_CNT , SCH_LOC FROM SMI_SCHE ss ORDER BY SCH_DATE desc, SCH_TIME desc LIMIT 10

SELECT concat(ss.SCH_DATE, ss.SCH_TIME) SCH_DATE , ss.SCH_NM , ss.SCH_CNT , ss.SCH_LOC FROM SMI_ATN_MNG sam LEFT OUTER JOIN SMI_SCHE ss ON sam.SCH_SEQ = ss.SCH_SEQ WHERE MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} ORDER BY ss.SCH_DATE desc, ss.SCH_TIME desc limit 10

SELECT mm.USER_NM , aa.RCNT_DATE , aa.diff FROM (SELECT a.MEM_SEQ , a.RCNT_DATE , DATEDIFF(now(), a.RCNT_DATE) diff FROM (SELECT sam.MEM_SEQ , MAX(ss.SCH_DATE) AS RCNT_DATE FROM SMI_ATN_MNG sam LEFT OUTER JOIN SMI_SCHE ss ON sam.SCH_SEQ = ss.SCH_SEQ WHERE ss.SMI_SEQ = 1 GROUP BY sam.MEM_SEQ) a) aa LEFT OUTER JOIN MEM_MNG mm ON aa.MEM_SEQ = mm.MEM_SEQ WHERE mm.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY diff DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT mm.USER_NM , sam.CNT FROM (SELECT MEM_SEQ , count(*) AS CNT FROM SMI_ATN_MNG GROUP BY MEM_SEQ) sam LEFT OUTER JOIN MEM_MNG mm ON sam.MEM_SEQ = mm.MEM_SEQ WHERE mm.SMI_SEQ = 1 AND mm.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY sam.CNT DESC
